entries.title_d: With mounting pressure from the Empire, Nym has called in several of his highest ranking Captains to mount directed operations against the Empire and Storm Squadron forces operating in the Lok System.  You are charged to protect this transport at all costs.
entries.title: Lok System: Shelter from the Storm
entries.thanks_3: Rather weak storm if you ask me.
entries.thanks_2: The Imperials want this system, this pressure is unrelenting.
entries.thanks_1: The cargo is still safe, for now.
entries.taunt_3: You will not make it through.
entries.taunt_2: Oberhaur will give me a promotion for this!
entries.taunt_1: You were foolish to think you could get away.
entries.reason_3: I know we have a mole... I suspect that zabrak woman, she is the only one that could sell us out.
entries.reason_2: I do not believe that the Imperials would pass up a target like this.
entries.reason_1: We have some important cargo today.  Do NOT fail us Captain.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet the Transport
entries.quest_location_d: The travel route for the Kimogila's Claw is classified, but we have reason to believe this information was compromised.
entries.quest_escort_d: Protect the Claw and her important cargo
entries.panic_2: Stay focused, they will not miss this opportunity.
entries.goodbye_2: Making the jump to lightspeed now.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Vestil: < \#pcontrast1 I have uploaded the rendezvous point for the Kimigila's claw to you.  Do not lose this transport, they are vital to our continued operations. Storm Squadron wants this transport.  They will come fast and often, stay with it and get them through. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: \#pcontrast3 You have failed to protect the Kimogila's Claw
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Vestil < \#pcontrast1 The Kimogila's claw is lost and our generals killed.  We are finished! \#pcontrast3 >
entries.autorewardbody: You do good work.  We are sending something you way... 10000 credits isn't much, but we like to show a little appreciation.
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Comptuer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Designated rendezvous point reached. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: The VIP's are too valuable for this sort of disregard.
